home.title: Es ist Zeit, Statify in deinem Server zu nutzen.
home.desc: Statify is a well made Statistic Discord Bot made for everyone who wants to see how their Server is going that is on Discord Since 2020!
home.features_desc: We provide you the best features in Statify!

features.1_desc: Easily create your own Statistics and show the world what your Discord Server has. Change everything including the color, images, language and more!
features.2_desc: See how active your community is and improve your Server by that Data. Automatic Chart tracking and generation for Messages, Voicetime, Useramount and many more!
features.3_desc: Show the world what your community got and battle for the global Top 10 in Messageamount or Voiceactivity. Or just battle between the top 10 in your Server.

ready_try2: Invite Statify and start giving your server cool perks!

features.title: Statify Features and Commands
features.desc: Here you will find all Commands, Features and stats for the Statify Discord Bot.
features.features_desc: Statify is a small and new Discord Bot to display advanced Statistics, Track and generate Charts and many more things.

premium.title: Statify Premium
premium.desc: With Statify Premium you can unlock exclusive Premium Features

features.title: Features
features.desc: Here is a list of all Features you get with Statify Premium
features.1_desc: Your Statistics will update faster than normal Statistcs
features.2_title: Up to 25 Stats in one Statistic Message
features.2_desc: You can set up to 25 Stats in on Statistic Message.
features.3_desc: Change the Icon, Banner and Description of your Statistic Message.

premium.how_desc: You can get Statify Premium by boosting our Discord Server. After you boosted the Server you will get a Private Message from our Statify Manager. Please follow the instructions sent to you to active your Premium Membership. If you have any Problems feel free to open a ticket in the Ticket-Support.

about.title: About Statify
about.text:
Statify is a small and new Discord Bot to display advanced Statistics, track and generate charts and more.
We are a Team from germany consist of one Bot Developer, one Web Developer, a manager and one Designer.

getting-started.title: Getting Started with Statify
getting-started.desc: Here you can see how to invite the Discord Bot and setup you Statistics.

steps.1_desc:
Invite the Discord Bot to your Server by clicking here.
When you successfully invited the bot you will be redirected to a confirmation page.
steps.2_desc:
Enter the s!setup command and follow the steps shown on the screen.
If everything is complete a Statistic Message will be created in your selected Textchannel.
steps.3_desc:
You can customise the Discord Bot by changing the language or the prefix.
Use s!prefix (new Prefix) or s!language (new Language)
steps.4_desc:
Get the top 10 members with the most messages or voicetime with the s!leaderboard command.
Use s!leaderboard (messages/voicetime/textchannel/voicechannel)(guild/global).
You can also get the Statistics of a specific User by typing s!user (@User).
steps.5_desc:
Know how active your community is by generating a own chart for your Discord Server.
Use s!chart (user/bots/invites/boosts/total_messages/total_voicetime/messages_today/voicetime_today)

getting-started.still: If you still need help with the Bot. Feel free to join our Discord Server and open a ticket in #ticket-support
